towards.statement: MBA graduates demonstrate the ability to lead the organization ethically and strategically
Develop constructive resolutions for ethical dilemmas based on application of ethical theories, principles and models.

children.statement: Identify and explain why a situation presents an ethical dilemma in contexts that are familiar or new, simple or complex, personal or organizational.
Introduce and analyze best available alternatives to ethical dilemmas using a set of well supported criteria.
Propose and defend the best possible resolution to the ethical dilemmas, including specific recommended actions, expected outcomes, and a contingency plan.
Identify and evaluate the risks to the organization and its key stakeholders associated with failing to take actions to resolve an ethical dilemma.

Evaluate major business/organizational systems and processes and make recommendations for improvement.
